### Problem 8.3

Graph A
```{r}
Frame <- CPS85 %>% ggplot(aes(x=age, y=wage))
Frame + geom_point()
```

Graph C
```{r}
Frame <- CPS85 %>% ggplot(aes(x=age, y=wage))
Frame + geom_point(aes(shape=sex)) + 
  facet_grid(married ~ .)
```

Graph D
```{r}
Frame <- CPS85 %>% ggplot(aes(x=age, y=wage))
Frame + geom_point(aes(shape=married)) +
  ylim(0,30)
```
